<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600>Yuuto quickly finished his meal as it wouldn&#39;t take long for his next bowl to come up.

<font color = white>&#34;I&#39;m not pitying you. Like you said, you&#39;ll pay me back, so this is ain&#39;t charity.&#34;</font>

Despite his initial smirk, at the very least his tone wasn&#39;t demeaning. <font color = white>&#34;That aside though, nice to meet you Hajime.&#34;</font> Tapping his chopsticks against one another as their introductions were over, the chef came up and finally served them their food.

It was good to see the other boy digging into the food rather than flat out refusing it. <font color = white>&#34;You should take it easy.&#34;</font> He slides a cup of water near Hajime&#39;s bowl.</font></font></font>

He&#39;s chowing down on the ramen as if it were the last noodle dish on the planet, shoveling food into his mouth faster than what he could chew it and he eventually finishes it off with a massive slurp from the bowl..!

<font color = white>&#34;Ah, man. That was great...&#34;</font> He admits, patting his stomach a couple of times before he rises to his feet.

<font color = white>&#34;Really?&#34;</font> He asks, glancing back at the young Uchiha.

<font color = white>&#34;Most of your kind would not say so.&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<font color = white>&#34;Most of my kind?&#34;</font> Raising an eyebrow at the bright boy, the Uchiha smirked again. <font color = white>&#34;You sure make it sound that we&#39;re all the same.&#34;</font> He placed his chopsticks on top of the empty bowl.

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#95ff95"><a href=?src=[0x30000c3];action=name;character=5098d245aa911c02a50e276087c0b4a9c96ab5af7243280a41a43da0f13611af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #95ff95;">The baggy eye'd individual</a> says:</b><span style="color:#95ff95"><font color = white> Medical Nin are quite excellent at giving hard ass he-</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#95ff95><a href=?src=[0x30000c3];action=name;character=5098d245aa911c02a50e276087c0b4a9c96ab5af7243280a41a43da0f13611af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #95ff95;">The baggy eye'd individual</a> covers her mouth... <br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000c3];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> had no idea that he had been held back on.

He simply figured that despite being part of the Senju, she was a girl.

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff7c80><font color = white>&#34;The rules are simple! I&#39;ll be asking a question, and whoever answers correctly first gets to step forward. First one to pass-&#34;</font>

<font color = white>&#34;- this spot here, wins. Ah- and if you give an incorrect answer, whether you&#39;re first or not, you have to step backwards. The winner will receive.. ryo! <br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc3300"><a href=?src=[0x30000c3];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#cc3300"><font color = white> No questions, let&#39;s begin..!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><a href=?src=[0x30000c3];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">The gloomy eccentric</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> ...Verily.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#5a5a8c><a href=?src=[0x30000c3];action=name;character=0cffdd18de5c8680e368289f9bdf398f3cdddf405696c9e6a00949f77b717dd4 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #5a5a8c;">The late bloomer</a> Being quite content with keeping to himself, the last thing he anticipated was someone waltzing up to strike a conversation. After all, given the circumstances, he figured most folks around were probably younger than him. It was a tough pill to swallow, being on the older side yet perched on such a low position of the shinobi ladder.

Still, he managed to conjure up a sheepish grin in return, refusing to let rudeness take over. <font color = white>&#34;Kaoru.&#34;</font> He replied, giving a brief introduction..</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000c3];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> attempts to take a step forth, as he was the first one who answered a question. </font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000c3];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">The platinum blonde girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> No questions. Only answers.</font></font></font></span></span>

To think, he took advantage of the situation so quickly..!
<font color = white>&#34;Ap-ap. You didn&#39;t answer a question- back up.&#34;</font> </font></font></font>

<font color = white>&#34;We must climb.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#993a33><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=a3bbc993a493a9aa0d8b00d5632878d441b2d78e7dd2f8005582507da0962fd2 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #993a33;">The solemn youngster</a> Runs up to the mountain and limbers up for a moment getting ready. Wasting no time he jumps up upon the side of the mountain and grabs onto the rocks. A quick glance was given to those who stepped up as well, some girl with white hair and a kid who's name was...Try? That didn't matter, now was not the time to get distracted.

focusing back onto the rock he'd start his climb, his first real moment of the academy. determined not to make a fool of himself the young man doesn't focus on being fast or first, but on consistency. Maybe he wouldn't get to the top first, but he was damn sure going to get there.</font></font></font>

Momoko instead moved back and walked to the nearest lake, kneeling close to it, getting a handfull of water and splashing it across her face. She got up, dusted herself off, took her sandals off, set them aside, and looked right back up at the TALL mountain.

Momoko held her fists back, and started to accumulate momentum. . .

Beginning to utilize the infamous Super Peel Out, Trademarked, catching up with speed and boosting at high-mach towards the Mountain! Her hand shot back,

dramatically reaching out towards the rock, with a blitz effect covering up her POV, flames erupting out of her fingertips, GRIPPING on one rock-hard surface!

Momoko started to punch the mountain&#39;s walls, beginning to climb at a ridiculously fast pace, surpassin-

no, wait, she hasn&#39;t even gotten one meter above the ground. Momoko is scratching the surface at comically high speeds and going nowhere, because physics decided they&#39;d specifically fuck her over.

She looks like a feral cat trying to get over some curtains.</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#996633>With utmost confidence, Shishorama stands tall and unwavering before the formidable mountain. She flexes her fingers, producing a satisfying crackling sound, and rotates her neck to loosen any tension before taking a determined step forward. Despite being presented with a daunting task, she took it upon herself to undergo it. 

Shisho charges towards the towering rock formation. As she approaches, she reaches out to touch its rugged surface, feeling the rough texture under her fingertips. Though the task seems daunting, with nothing but her own strength and unwavering resolve, she sets out to climb it, determined to conquer the daunting challenge.

With a steady pace and an unwavering smile, she ascends the mountain, pushing herself to her natural limits. The sweat on her face and the strain in her muscles are clear signs of the effort she is putting into the climb. Nevertheless, she refuses to be defeated by the physical toll and makes her way to the top.

<font color = white>&#34;ARGGHHHHH!&#34;</font> The intense young woman <b>ROARS</b> at the top of her lungs once the pinnacle had been reached, claiming her victory among the students that remained at the bottom of the rocky formation.

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600>Although the Uchiha hand't found a good spot to continue to climbing, he managed to see one just out of reach. He had an idea of what to do and wanting to show himself capable, he tried to get to it straight away...but... there was some hesitation as he would need to jump and be airborne for a moment, if he missed, he was screwed.

The fall wasn't THAT great though, so with his heart speeding up, he took a deep breath and made a leap, hands shooting forward eagerly, almost desperately for the crevice that would allow him to continue on.

Afterwards, he had to take a few deep breaths to calm down and continued on! Now he wasn't as a fraid as before, and just as he was about to reach the top, he heard Shishorama's screams of excitement.

He was just a bit too late for it. Well, next time!<br>(Uchiha, Yuuto)</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#468ca3><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=f61a8a99ebea0ae5eb4c51eff20f4e2e71d5611c015e0483034fed646d017940 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #468ca3;">The wandering child</a> looked up towards the cliffside with a gulp.

<font color = white>&#34;Oh wow.&#34;</font> he says softly, tugging at his collar. They&#39;d look around to the others, looking for reactions perhaps. He had hoped to see others as worried as he was, hoping to not seem TOO out of place with his fear of heights.

<font color = white>&#34;O-okay!&#34;</font> he said, marching towards the mountain now. He studied the rock&#39;s face with intensity, planning his way before actually even trying. They saw nooks and crannies that would potentially fit his hands and feet. After awhile of putting together a strategy, he&#39;d move!

One hand stretched up first, his foot following after as it placed itself in a crack along the rocks. Not even ten feet up he&#39;d look down, eyes becoming wide as he saw the ground below.

<font color = white>&#34;O-oh...&#34;</font> he sighed, looking back up now. contiuing the climb with a slow pace. He wouldn&#39;t rush it, just knowing he only had to reach the top and wasn&#39;t asked to do so with haste. Finally, he would grasp a hand on the top of the cliff, pulling himself up to the top shakily. 

<font color = white>&#34;I-I did it!&#34;</font> he&#39;d roar, looking down the cliffside before fainting, falling on his backside from the fear it had induced!</font></font></font>

Her pole finds the sandy ground of the river bank and lets her careen forward. Deftly, she jumped from it, and one small arm found itself reaching.

She grabbed at his wrist, thudding into the mountain harshly. 

That should have hurt, but she didn't make a sound. Moments later, she's found herself some footholds, and they've got a signfiicant headstart on the mountain.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#666699><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=0cffdd18de5c8680e368289f9bdf398f3cdddf405696c9e6a00949f77b717dd4 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #666699;">The late bloomer</a> put his plan into motion. Leaning his back against the wall and adopting a squatting stance, he formed his hands into a makeshift platform, ready to serve as a human springboard. This would give the more physically capable members, the Samurai and the Youth a chance to utilize their strength not just to gain height, but also to secure a grip on a ledge, providing a sturdy foundation for their climb.

If the pieces fell into place as hoped, the Samurai and the Youth would lift him up next, a sequence that would repeat as they ascended. His own role came next  using his position as a link, connecting the chain formed by the others. Depending on their willingness and ability, either the Youth or the Samurai could be the anchor and hook.

He acknowledged that not everyone would be on the same wavelength as him, so he proceeded with those who were on the same page. His personal charisma might influence some, but he understood its limits.</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#99ffcc><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=b9351ed3a270ddd5464dcb5ee63a9a1e7cb427e4a5ea97e0622c681fb994b9af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #99ffcc;">The chill young boy</a> get's lifted up and followed the busy browed guy.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#4a6969><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=b50c547b25a3147f6ec374147486b4aa8928ded90c2d4fbedcfe690c644a296f style = "text-decoration: none; color: #4a6969;">The pale, red-eyed acrobat</a> doesn't allow her to thud at all, in actuality. His strength? Now, that could be useful. The girl considered his help for a moment longer and then nodded.

<font color = white>&#34;Fine then, Uchiha.&#34;</font> She agreed. The girl stepped toward him and grabbed both of his hands to place them on her hips. <font color = white>&#34;Just throw me up, at about a fifteen degree angle. My brother will catch me.&#34;</font> She didn&#39;t seem to be bashful at all--

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600>Uchiha, Yuuto put his back to the wall, a little distance away from it. He crouched on the ground and adjsut his feet, both his hands were brought up. <font color = white>&#34;I&#39;ll try to launch you as far as I can, make sure to grab the wall and continue climbing or go for Shishorama.&#34;</font> He was pretty strong, he didn&#39;t know how far they would go, but better than on their own.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#66ff99"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=5098d245aa911c02a50e276087c0b4a9c96ab5af7243280a41a43da0f13611af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #66ff99;">The baggy eye'd chuunin</a> says:</b><span style="color:#66ff99"><font color = white> The task is laid out for you, how you get it done is how a shinobi completes their mission.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#12745f"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=05710d2f56464177168085caf60c9d3bc4c5fa5f94dad09ef1b837fa37c11718 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #12745f;">The punk with twin scarves</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#12745f"><font color = white> Okay okay... I&#39;ll be your lackey for three days if I fail! How&#39;s that sound?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> turned and reached up on the cliff face for any sort of hand hold that would bare his weight even as he slid the fishing rod over his shoulder. He then took a step up, digging the toe of his sandal into the stone face and turning his foot so that he had more surface touching. With a hop he reached another hand-hold and began the systematic climbing of the cliff. He was warmed up now but he was also a little fatigued, so this was just as hard, if not harder, than the first level, and the stakes were much higher. 

Slowly, but surely he worked his way up to the next level. The distance was farther than before but the group was counting on him. Shishorama even cheered for him and let him make the climb first! She trusted him!

The youth winced and hissed as his forearms started to cramp up and his hands went numb with charlie horses but he continued on, stopping only to shake his hands when he felt confident he could hold himself up.

Once Try weakly pulled himself over the top he laid flat on his stomach and took big, gasping breaths for air.

A long moment later the fishing line and scarf were lowered down to the chill boy.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#4a6969><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=b50c547b25a3147f6ec374147486b4aa8928ded90c2d4fbedcfe690c644a296f style = "text-decoration: none; color: #4a6969;">The pale, red-eyed acrobat</a> doesn't grab her on the way up, no. She had been fired off with much too much force to try and slow her down. He could only watch as the pale girl shoots up and over him, to which he turns and waddles in place, determining where she would fall.

Her lightness worked to his advantage in this department. It was very simple to ease her falling into a simple motion, swinging himself around with the excess inertia and planting her firmly on the rocky, cliffside ground.

As she stated as much, she took some generous steps back. <font color = white>&#34;Oh-- and slippery. I apologize in advance if I slip and knee you in the throat, nose, and or forehead in the process! The Officer&#39;s to blame. She took us everywhere-- even through a river-- trying to find this place!&#34;</font> 

One self-deprecating chuckle later and she&#39;s ready to give it a go. From the edge of the river, she fell into a sprint, her sandals clacking and crunching across the sediment, leaving a trail of wet footprints in her path. 

<font color = white>&#34;CatchmeCatchmeCatchme--!&#34;</font> 

She skips a jump, expecting the confident boy to give her the boost she needed to go flying up the elevation-- and to be perfectly honest, she had zero idea what comes after that, since she got a bit distracted! Wait-- there&#39;s a fishing line? 

If so, she&#39;d reach out to grab that and or the cliff-side. Whichever came first!</font></font></font>

It was a little extra weight for him, but...

<font color = white>&#34;Better hurry.&#34;</font> She called. <font color = white>&#34;I&#39;m letting go in fifteen seconds.&#34;</font>

Rather, she wandered over to take her spot after Hajime, waiting for his own leap to either soar, or flop.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> takes a deep breath.

Once Hanako manages to rise up to the next level of the cliff, he suddenly steps forth. With practiced movements, he leaps onto Yuuto and he is boosted upwards...!

<font color = white>&#34;Let&#39;s go...!&#34;</font>

An arm extends, to try to reach the cliff-side, or Shishorama&#39;s hand... Despite the fact that he didn&#39;t actually want to accept her help.

He was also wet, due to the river they swam through.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#996633>With an eager expression on her face, Shisho stood at the edge of the cliff, her eyes fixed on Yuuto as he prepared to boost the first person up. <br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ffcc00><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">The gloomy eccentric</a> took her turn once Hajime was seen to the top of the plateau. A nod was offered to the pair then, even if she had to lean over the edge a bit to show her gratitude to Yuuto.</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">The platinum blonde girl</a> seemed entirely unafraid of zooming right into being tossed several meters into the air. An underdeveloped aversion to danger perhaps. Who knows! 

<font color = white>&#34;Oh, wow. I made it! Thanks!&#34;</font>

After getting properly yoinked and placed to the side like luggage (with a fragile label on it), she found herself delivered to the next stage! A system of fishing line pulleys meant to lift them the rest of the way. Uh--

<font color = white>&#34;Are these really strong enough to hold an entire person? Eh. We&#39;ll see!&#34;</font>
 
As the designated crash test dummy, she twisted a double-wound grip around the fishing lines and held tight!

<font color = white>&#34;<i>O-kaaaay</i>, reel me up!&#34;</font> 
She lets them work their give-man-strong magic!</font></font></font>

<font color = white>&#34;Lets do this!&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#12745f><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=05710d2f56464177168085caf60c9d3bc4c5fa5f94dad09ef1b837fa37c11718 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #12745f;">The punk with twin scarves</a> rolled his eyes, abjuring to their remarks. Though, it seemed they in fact weren&#39;t on the strong suit, food for thought he supposed.

There was an advantage to this feat, however; Shun&#39;Ichi was going to do something unorthodox to his experience: he was attempting to mimick Komo&#39;s Body Flicker, albeit with only the process of controlling chakra.

Assuming the lady wouldn&#39;t simply show him again, Shun&#39;Ichi improvised.
He remembers reading a bit on the tiger seal; the de-facto sign to focus chakra within the human body; Shinobi works was more his sister&#39;s talent, however the prospect of chakra control always intruigued him.
Time to display that feat in full flux; with his feet upon the wall and the centre of balance upon his heart--Shun&#39;Ichi placed his index and middle fingers on each hand together, and closed his eyes.
Five seconds pass, he recognizes a spark of energy within his belly, chakra.
Ten seconds now, each second is taken spreading chakra throughout his body, before sending it primarily to his legs.
Five more seconds, he feels a sensation unfamiliar to his physical body; and it provides slack for his heart, the chakra to his feet seem to be stitching him to the mountain.

Shun&#39;Ichi wastes zero time, he rushed up the mountain all the way to a point just short of the peak, he shifts around glncing at the Chuunin once more.
<font color = white>&#34;Still think I&#39;m not up to par yet?!&#34;</font> He goads, though while doing so, he recognizes a fault in his prowess: <i>Reserve.</i>

Immediately the boy scrambles his hands onto the wall, realizing how much strain he&#39;s just placed on his body with that simple feat. He&#39;s in a huff, relying on his own desperation and the Kaguya duo&#39;s willingness to hang on to remain.</font></font></font>

It simply hadn&#39;t occurred to her that climbing along was an option! Despite enduring bumps and shoving away from the wall where she could to avoid injury!
 
<font color = white>&#34;Don&#39;t act like a fish! Got it! I&#39;ll be as land-creature as I can be! Uh-- my hands get pruny in water, gah, I hate that!&#34;</font> 

How was she so heavy? Well-- she was drenched from, again, going through the river twice to get here! 

<font color = white>&#34;Wait--&#34;</font>

Ah. Finally someone said it out loud. <font color = white>&#34;I&#39;m supposed to climb? Ohh...&#34;</font>

She found a nice little set of edges to hook her fingers and sandal-tip onto and started to support some of her own weight along the way. <font color = white>&#34;Ah, hey. It&#39;s a little faster this way. You&#39;re really smart, handstand guy!&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600>Uchiha, Yuuto sighed.. damn, that was a lot of energy he put into this. Looking up, he could feel his muscles starting to cry as he would need to get back up again. He had the stamina to help so many people, but even so, he hadn&#39;t thought this through on needing to go back up.

Well, that was his duty... and so, he starts climbing back up, holding back cusses every step of the way, but the time he reached the ledge, he was already extending his hand to Shishomaru. <font color = white>&#34;Need some help...&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<font color = white>&#34;Nope.&#34;</font> A single word was said, before she looked over towards the others still working.

She would look around at the class of students, seeing most at the top. She folded her arms on top of her vest as a breath squeaked passed her teeth.

<font color = white>&#34;I see that most of you understood the exercise. A lesson as well as a workout to go along with it. So, lets call it a day right now.

<font color = white>&#34;Hey! Quit running from me, cowardly one!&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#4a6969"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=b50c547b25a3147f6ec374147486b4aa8928ded90c2d4fbedcfe690c644a296f style = "text-decoration: none; color: #4a6969;">The pale, red-eyed acrobat</a> says:</b><span style="color:#4a6969"><font color = white> I thought his name meant brave.</font></font></font></span></span>

When his sister got shrill, it wasn't pretty so he didn't disagree with disengaging.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> winced hard at the telltale crunch sounds coming from beneath the chunky fella&#39;s third fat fold. It took her right out of those climbing attempts. 

<font color = white>&#34;Err--&#34;</font> 
She poked her head around the cliff&#39;s corner.

<font color = white>&#34;Are you okaaay, friend? Need the water now? Are your bones unsnappened? Or do you need a dip?&#34;</font> </font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600>Uchiha, Yuuto was more than ready to receive the fat kid and help throw them up. He had done this so many times today. Surely he could do it one more... but still... for some reason the kid seemed more and more menacing with each step.

God, he was tired, maybe this hadn't been a good idea.

Contact was made and he was the first one to buckle under the weight, even Kohaku who he knew hadn't managed to climb up by his own had managed to put more into this than him.

He was crushed.

Mission Failure. <i>We'll get them next time.</i></font></font></font>

Though he felt that get UTTERLY DESTROYED as everything began dipping back downwards. The party was wiped in an instant, the blubber has not only triumphed the three under the boy were stuck.

<font color = white>&#34;Woah! You guys did it! I&#39;m on top of the mountain! This is so great!&#34;</font> The fat kid was thrilled. He quickly lifted himself off of the three, not noticing that he was barely a few feet off of the ground. He would run off overjoyed.

<font color = white>&#34;Out ya&#39; go.&#34;</font> In a few strokes of her free arm, she drags him to the shore, where he&#39;d be free to hoist himself out at his leisure. She probably hasn&#39;t calmed down, but then again, what did he say that upsetted her so.

He didn&#39;t use chakra this time, getting the feeling he&#39;s going to have to recover slightly in order to flee again.

<font color = white>&#34;And can probably wear you out before you knock me out... Regardless, what did I say?&#34;</font> He questions again, this time showing vulnerability rather than defensiveness, being at her mercy while climbing, subject to any maleficence she may provide.</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">gloomy eccentric girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> ...Doubtfully.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#996633><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=d6f2f9f96d1be9a6ab1cb457c5902c319b9f800001cf5f4cc1faab287b4c08cc style = "text-decoration: none; color: #996633;">Senju, Shishorama</a> randomly chimes into the conversation and fades back out.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> manages to hoist himself up after a few moments, with a few winces here and there. The fat had been extra fat, after all.

He&#39;s immediately twisting his shirt, trying to get extra moisture out of it until he glances at Hanako with a quizzical expression.

<font color = white>&#34;You mind lending me your towel?&#34;</font> He asks.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Well...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> I had fun.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> tilted her head. 

<font color = white>&#34;Huh? Just air dry. It only takes a minute.&#34;</font> 
She said it as if it were common sense. </font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600>Uchiha, Yuuto watches the dancer and the punk's interaction with some interest for now, at the very least hoping that there wouldn't be any violence among classmates. Unsure if it happened already since it was out of his sight before.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> There&#39;s something about being sore from hard exercise that just feels good.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc3300"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc3300"><font color = white> ..</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> ...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> I really feel like I accomplished something.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">gloomy eccentric girl</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> Er. Hard exercise?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Yeah. Scaling the cliffs.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#b24a55><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=353e3f61154579756ccb0358ccd5c7c725bcdac2e6ef11cc728d031650c5693d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #b24a55;">The aloof, white-haired dancer</a> stomped a loose rock, sending a shower of pebbles down on Shun'ichi, his latest words only inflaming her scorn. She wheeled around on her brother, and weighed the pro's and cons of striking him, too. Her blood was boiling with the characteristic lust of her heritage...

They were lucky she was tired from climbing the rocks.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">gloomy eccentric girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> Ah.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> whispers faintly.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> side-eyes Hanako.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> stares down at his completely drenched self.

He waits approximately sixty seconds, before he glances up at her.

<font color = white>&#34;It&#39;s not happening. Did you...?&#34;</font> 

A brow quirks.

Bizarre!</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ffcc00><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">gloomy eccentric girl</a> did not speak further on the topic, her lips just pressed together in a thin line.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#12745f"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=05710d2f56464177168085caf60c9d3bc4c5fa5f94dad09ef1b837fa37c11718 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #12745f;">The punk with twin scarves</a> says:</b><span style="color:#12745f"><font color = white> Oww owwwiwowwowowowow...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc99ff><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=e3a9836492142a47018fb7ee3f6d754f5583376dc24239dd1e63ed28b36eb127 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">Uchiha, Kohaku</a> was also questioning what he said, didn&#39;t he just comment on how they were siblings? Then she snatched him up in some weird sort of way, then he turned to Try.

<font color = white>&#34;You should&#39;ve been here to lift the fat kid that made my rib cage concave.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">gloomy eccentric girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> I don&#39;t believe she has a towel.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Ah, sorry Kohaku.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Next time! </font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#12745f><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=05710d2f56464177168085caf60c9d3bc4c5fa5f94dad09ef1b837fa37c11718 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #12745f;">The punk with twin scarves</a> although the rocks weren't large enough to cause massive damage, it roughed his tender child skin quite up.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc99ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=e3a9836492142a47018fb7ee3f6d754f5583376dc24239dd1e63ed28b36eb127 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">Uchiha, Kohaku</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc99ff"><font color = white> Hopefully, we failed terribly.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> &#39;s clothing was in the active process of having moisture osmosised away. Formerly dark spots regained their natural color. Almost as if sponged away. 

<font color = white>&#34;Oh, yeah. That too! No towel. Just air dry.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc3300"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc3300"><font color = white> ...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#4a6969><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=b50c547b25a3147f6ec374147486b4aa8928ded90c2d4fbedcfe690c644a296f style = "text-decoration: none; color: #4a6969;">The pale, red-eyed acrobat</a> smiles, amused at the anger, and the pain from Shun&#39;Ichi. <font color = white>&#34;You two are good together.&#34;</font> It&#39;s funny.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> pulled his clothes back on.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> ... why are you still so soggy?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">gloomy eccentric girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> That confirms my suspicion, Hanako.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300>Now, he was interested.

He stood there, drenched, while she was already dry. This was clearly strange. Were his eyes playing tricks on him?

He raises a hand to pat her shoulder a few times, before he attempts to gently pinch her cheek...!

<font color = white>&#34;No way.&#34;</font><br>(<a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a>)</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> Oh, right. Thanks for pulling me up, Guy!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Hm...?</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#b24a55><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=353e3f61154579756ccb0358ccd5c7c725bcdac2e6ef11cc728d031650c5693d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #b24a55;">The aloof, white-haired dancer</a> turned back to the rocks and slid down them next to the boy. <br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> This is why I failed language class.</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">gloomy eccentric girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> His name is Might, Try, Hanako.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> I haven&#39;t properly introduced myself!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc3300"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc3300"><font color = white> ok but why are you dry</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600>Uchiha, Yuuto scratched the back of his head. Well, at least that didn't escalate, he then turned to watch the amusing sight that was Hanako trying to figure out Try's name.</font></font></font>

<font color = white>&#34;...Salty rocks have blended with the water over a very long time.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> ...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> But.. so has fish pee.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc99ff><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=e3a9836492142a47018fb7ee3f6d754f5583376dc24239dd1e63ed28b36eb127 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">Uchiha, Kohaku</a> dead panned towards his cousin... Oh no. He felt for Yuuto, he really did. Though he can&#39;t imagine that sort of outcast status, he had no words for a moment... only a long gaze of concern before nodding.

<font color = white>&#34;I-I see, living in the cold shoulder status... That&#39;s the worst, I&#39;d take up Taijutsu and Shurikenjutsu simply to stay away from the tension...

I&#39;m sure you&#39;ll pass their expectations and make them regret it as you climb up the ranks in the name of the Uchiha.&#34;</font> In Kohaku&#39;s family there could be no failures, even a late bloomer could become a genius.

Even if they would absolutely do far more than ignore Kohaku if he failed his Right of Passage, he would be put through absolute hell. </font></font></font>

But! Dogs, like most land creatures, enjoyed food. Meat especially. Of that, she is certain, from all those times she&#39;s witnessed strays going nuts over discarded karage. 

Along their travels, she found the trash can in question, right outside the local BBQ joint and--!

With a paper towel bearing hand, she procured some almost-cleaned rib bones, entirely overlooking any repulsed stares from her peers. She went about, waving the bone along, calling out in her sweetest animal-baby-talk tone.

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773><a href=?src=[0x30000b2];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> socked a small-mouthed bass in the eye for getting too close to her. 
Nasty things. Minutes elapsed.

A need for air never arrived. Not like how the Senju described it. There was no pains in her chest. No stinging in her eyes. No signs of fatigue at all really. She felt nice and collected. Haze was the furthest thing from her mind. She's focused on the vague sensation of presences beyond the surface. So far--

<i>Just us. No dog.. huh. Maybe he'll come back when he feels enough time passed for us to leave? They probably have it down to a science, since he comes scavenging for food here often. He probably knows after people depart, that's the best time to find leftovers?</i></font></font></font>

<font color = white>&#34;No, not my dog, he&#39;s wanted though! He&#39;s Miss Kome&#39;s missing dog, apparently he goes missing every week. It was on the newspaper. Me and some others tried to catch him last night but we failed.&#34;</font> He didn&#39;t expect him to be caught this easily.

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ff6600">Uchiha, Yuuto yells:</b><span style="color:#ff6600"><font color = white> Hey, nice to meet you!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#a06d87><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=7026d78d56a1fe983d2984f627d0b08bc99cdeb69fb899b3c7af8c72ade0049d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #a06d87;">Senju, Kumirama</a> would take some of the pork bun and would do a little dance because the food was oh so good.

<font color = white>&#34;Yuuuummmm&#34;</font>the girl would begin to blush as she continued to munch on the bun.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#468ca3><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=f61a8a99ebea0ae5eb4c51eff20f4e2e71d5611c015e0483034fed646d017940 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #468ca3;">The amber-haired boy</a> smiled while waving to the trio.

<font color = white>&#34;H-hey guys.&#34;</font> he said before taking his seat.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600>Uchiha, Yuuto giggled at the little dance done by Kumirama before taking up a pork bun served to him. Delicious~! His expression instantly brightened at the warmth that spread through his body in this rather cold day.

<font color = white>&#34;Hey Chef, another serving of pork buns.&#34;</font> Tapping his chopsticks, he pointed at Yakeru. <font color = white>&#34;I&#39;m Uchiha, Yuuto by the way.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#996633><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=d6f2f9f96d1be9a6ab1cb457c5902c319b9f800001cf5f4cc1faab287b4c08cc style = "text-decoration: none; color: #996633;">Senju, Shishorama</a> waited for her food, kicking her legs around aimlessly while sitting on the stool.  After the food finally came, she obliterated the lot of it within seconds, not taking a single second to actually enjoy the taste. She was quite hungry after being busy all day long.

<font color = white>&#34;Mmmmhmmm! This is good stuff! Good idea convincing Yuuto to come here, Kumirama!&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#996633"><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=d6f2f9f96d1be9a6ab1cb457c5902c319b9f800001cf5f4cc1faab287b4c08cc style = "text-decoration: none; color: #996633;">Senju, Shishorama</a> says:</b><span style="color:#996633"><font color = white> Must&#39;ve missed you ordering it.~</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><font size=-4><font color=#996633><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=d6f2f9f96d1be9a6ab1cb457c5902c319b9f800001cf5f4cc1faab287b4c08cc style = "text-decoration: none; color: #996633;">Senju, Shishorama</a> OOCs<font color = white>: (brb)</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font size=-4><font color=#996633><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=d6f2f9f96d1be9a6ab1cb457c5902c319b9f800001cf5f4cc1faab287b4c08cc style = "text-decoration: none; color: #996633;">Senju, Shishorama</a> OOCs<font color = white>: (I hunger irl)</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366cc><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=e438cfb9824a017116d6dd7cba70c1a209d657a424c4c1b23c9de437e4656094 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #3366cc;">The short dark-haired boy</a> walks by the village with his hands tucked in his pockets, noticing a familiar voice calling out to him. Turning around, he&#39;d notice Shishorama at the ramen shop along with a few other students. Slowly, he&#39;d join up with them.

<font color = white>&#34;Hey guys. What are you eating? It sure smells nice. &#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#468ca3><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=f61a8a99ebea0ae5eb4c51eff20f4e2e71d5611c015e0483034fed646d017940 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #468ca3;">Yakeru</a> would place some change on the table, ordering their fill.

<font color = white>&#34;Pork b-buns please.&#34;</font> he said with a nod, they&#39;d then look over his shoulder, smiling to the one who introduced themselves.

<font color = white>&#34;It&#39;s nice to meet you, I&#39;m Sarutobi, Yakeru.&#34;</font> he&#39;d introduce himself with a weak smile.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#3366cc"><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=e438cfb9824a017116d6dd7cba70c1a209d657a424c4c1b23c9de437e4656094 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #3366cc;">The short dark-haired boy</a> says:</b><span style="color:#3366cc"><font color = white> Nice to meet you Yakeru.</font></font></font></span></span>

It sure got him hungry in an instant. Placing his hand in his pocket, he&#39;d get his money pouch, only to open it and see -- there was nothing inside, or rather not enough Ryo to get a proper meal.

<font color = white>&#34;Uh-huh. &#34;</font> he mumbled to himself dissapointed, before returning the pouch back into his pocket.

<font color = white>&#34;You know what, nothing for me please, I&#39;ll just hang out. &#34;</font> - he&#39;d say to the shopkeepers.</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#a06d87"><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=7026d78d56a1fe983d2984f627d0b08bc99cdeb69fb899b3c7af8c72ade0049d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #a06d87;">Senju, Kumirama</a> says:</b><span style="color:#a06d87"><font color = white> Heya Yuuto.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#468ca3"><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=f61a8a99ebea0ae5eb4c51eff20f4e2e71d5611c015e0483034fed646d017940 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #468ca3;">Sarutobi, Yakeru</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#468ca3"><font color = white> Well, Laro. <br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600>Uchiha, Yuuto was just enjoying the pork buns through their time here. He had barely noticed the moment Laro arrived, another person to introduce himself. <font color = white>&#34;Hey, nice to meet you, Laro. I&#39;m Uchiha, Yuuto.&#34;</font>

<font color = white>&#34;You sure you don&#39;t want anything? It&#39;s my treat.&#34;</font> He said that without really waiting for an answer. <font color = white>&#34;Hey chef, another serving for our buddy Laro there.&#34;</font>

<font color = white>&#34;Sure, I still got some more money from the bounty. What should we get this time Kumirama?&#34;</font> Thankfully, as a street stall of sorts, this place&#39;s prices were rather cheap, and the food quality was still great.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#a06d87><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=7026d78d56a1fe983d2984f627d0b08bc99cdeb69fb899b3c7af8c72ade0049d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #a06d87;">Senju, Kumirama</a> would clear their throat as she slips the uchiha a list of food she wanted.The list contained three order of seaweed salad,ten chicken wings and some green tea ice cream.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> flops over the guard rail, entirely lacking in grace, and sploshed into the river. 

A minute later, she emerged, blowing on the recovered bill, trying and failing to air-dry it. A soggy set of sandal-prints were left in her trail as she made her way back to Position A! Lurking beneath the street light. 

Drenched, but the grin she wore says she's elated by her mission accomplished. </font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600>Uchiha, Yuuto had to hold back a laughter. <font color = white>&#34;Well, you&#39;re quite the glutton, arin&#39;t you?&#34;</font> That would really burn a hole through his pockets. <font color = white>&#34;Alright, but next time we&#39;re out eating, it&#39;s your treat, sounds fair?&#34;</font> And he wouildn&#39;t have mercy on her.

The list of food was quite appealing, and he decided to order it just to try some of those things as well. Thankfully, even if he ran out of the bounty money, he still had some pocket money as well since despite his relationship with his family, he&#39;s still an Uchiha.

<font color = white>&#34;Hey Chef, serve these over here, please!&#34;</font> Sliding the paper to the cook, he just waited a little bit before food started being served, each one with a smell more appetizing than the one before it.</font></font></font>

A small gesture, but had a great effect. Forming a smile on his face, his eyes slightly getting teary, he&#39;d down a nod to the Uchiha boy.

<font color = white>&#34;Thank you Yuuto, I owe you one. &#34;</font>

After a while another ration of pork buns would arrive, letting the smell fill out the area. He&#39;d quickly dig into his food.

<font color = white>&#34;Mhmm this is woo gwood. &#34;</font> - he&#39;d talk with his mouth full.</font></font></font>

Ignoring all the other statements being said.

<font color = white>&#34;Kumirama, I need you to come with me.&#34;</font> She eerily smiles.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#996633"><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=d6f2f9f96d1be9a6ab1cb457c5902c319b9f800001cf5f4cc1faab287b4c08cc style = "text-decoration: none; color: #996633;">Senju, Shishorama</a> says:</b><span style="color:#996633"><font color = white> -</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#996633"><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=d6f2f9f96d1be9a6ab1cb457c5902c319b9f800001cf5f4cc1faab287b4c08cc style = "text-decoration: none; color: #996633;">Senju, Shishorama</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#996633"><font color = white> Can I go? She&#39;s my sister!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366cc><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=e438cfb9824a017116d6dd7cba70c1a209d657a424c4c1b23c9de437e4656094 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #3366cc;">Laro</a> puts down the food as he slowly turns around.

<font color = white>&#34;Uh-huh, busted big time. &#34;</font> - he&#39;d mumble under his breath. But then it hit him. They were all noble clans so it would probably look quite bad on them, whatever it was. Him? He was nothing special. 

So he decided to step forward.

<font color = white>&#34;Miss Chuunin, it was me. It wasn&#39;t Kumirama. &#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#996633"><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=d6f2f9f96d1be9a6ab1cb457c5902c319b9f800001cf5f4cc1faab287b4c08cc style = "text-decoration: none; color: #996633;">Senju, Shishorama</a> says:</b><span style="color:#996633"><font color = white> I&#39;m equally responsible for her actions..</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ff6600">Uchiha, Yuuto says:</b><span style="color:#ff6600"><font color = white> Well... I&#39;ll save some food for you Kumirama. Good luck. We&#39;ll be waiting here.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#66ff99"><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=5098d245aa911c02a50e276087c0b4a9c96ab5af7243280a41a43da0f13611af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #66ff99;">Sensei</a> says:</b><span style="color:#66ff99"><font color = white> Oh? I wasn&#39;t told about anything, I just wanted to reward Kumirama.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#468ca3><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=f61a8a99ebea0ae5eb4c51eff20f4e2e71d5611c015e0483034fed646d017940 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #468ca3;">Sarutobi, Yakeru</a> gulped.

<font color = white>&#34;O-oh boy.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#a06d87><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=7026d78d56a1fe983d2984f627d0b08bc99cdeb69fb899b3c7af8c72ade0049d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #a06d87;">Senju, Kumirama</a> was about to run away,but an invisible force would cause her to trip.

<font color = white>&#34;Ugh....I guess it&#39;s a sign for me to come....Can I take my food with me?&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600>Uchiha, Yuuto didn't think he could argue against a Chuunin when he didn't even know what this was about-And hey! It was about a reward!</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#996633"><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=d6f2f9f96d1be9a6ab1cb457c5902c319b9f800001cf5f4cc1faab287b4c08cc style = "text-decoration: none; color: #996633;">Senju, Shishorama</a> says:</b><span style="color:#996633"><font color = white> -</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#996633"><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=d6f2f9f96d1be9a6ab1cb457c5902c319b9f800001cf5f4cc1faab287b4c08cc style = "text-decoration: none; color: #996633;">Senju, Shishorama</a> says:</b><span style="color:#996633"><font color = white> Oh.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366cc><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=e438cfb9824a017116d6dd7cba70c1a209d657a424c4c1b23c9de437e4656094 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #3366cc;">Laro</a> heaves a sigh of relief.

<font color = white>&#34;Back to my food it is then. &#34;</font>

He&#39;d instantly dart towards the pork buns. not letting them get cold. Almost as if he had the Flying Raijin. &#34;</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#66ff99"><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=5098d245aa911c02a50e276087c0b4a9c96ab5af7243280a41a43da0f13611af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #66ff99;">Sensei</a> says:</b><span style="color:#66ff99"><font color = white> Go ahead, take your food.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#996633"><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=d6f2f9f96d1be9a6ab1cb457c5902c319b9f800001cf5f4cc1faab287b4c08cc style = "text-decoration: none; color: #996633;">Senju, Shishorama</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#996633"><font color = white> Bye, Kumi!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#a06d87><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=7026d78d56a1fe983d2984f627d0b08bc99cdeb69fb899b3c7af8c72ade0049d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #a06d87;">Senju, Kumirama</a> would take wings,but would leave the rest.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#a06d87><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=7026d78d56a1fe983d2984f627d0b08bc99cdeb69fb899b3c7af8c72ade0049d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #a06d87;">Senju, Kumirama</a> had a scared expression on her face as she turned to her sister.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#66ff99"><a href=?src=[0x30000dc];action=name;character=5098d245aa911c02a50e276087c0b4a9c96ab5af7243280a41a43da0f13611af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #66ff99;">Komo-Sensei</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#66ff99"><font color = white> Are you all set to recieve your reward?</font></font></font></span></span>

I heard Uchihas can have cool glowy eyes.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600>Uchiha, Yuuto thinks that it wouldn't be the same thing to eat all this food without Kumirama.
